participant_1.name: Eli
participant_1.personality: Curious and adventurous, Eli has a vivid imagination and often wonders about the nature of his abilities.
participant_1.background: i can move objects with my mind. i was born with my heart outside my body. i am a boy. i had to have a transplant. since the surgery i have had strange powers.

participant_2.name: Tom
participant_2.personality: Tom is laid-back and friendly, enjoying simple pleasures in life and sharing stories of his adventures.
participant_2.background: i like to grill outdoors. i enjoy mowing my lawn on sunny days. i have been retired for a years. i go gambling in my spare time.
